# Immortal SEO

> Transform your online visibility with AI‑enhanced SEO services since 2008—combining technical mastery, semantic structuring, and AI‑ready content strategies to drive sustainable organic growth across Google, ChatGPT, Perplexity, and beyond.

Immortal SEO is a data-driven agency with over 15 years of experience, boasting a 94% client retention rate and tailored strategies for businesses of all sizes across traditional and emerging AI search environments.

## Quick Links

* [Home](https://immortalseo.com/): Landing page overview of AI-enhanced SEO services and methodology  
* [About Us](https://immortalseo.com/about): Company history, team, mission, and certifications since 2008  
* [Services](https://immortalseo.com/services): Comprehensive SEO offerings for both traditional and AI-driven search  
* [Tools](https://immortalseo.com/tools): Free SEO and AI optimization tools to support your strategy  
* [Case Studies](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies): Real-world success stories showcasing transformative SEO results  
* [Blog](https://immortalseo.com/blog): SEO insights, guides, and industry updates from our expert team  
* [Pricing](https://immortalseo.com/pricing): Transparent, competition-based SEO investment plans starting at $2,000/month  
* [Free SEO Audit](https://immortalseo.com/contact): Get a complimentary SEO analysis worth $1,500  

## Services

* [Technical SEO & Site Architecture](https://immortalseo.com/services/technical-seo): Optimize crawlability, indexation, site speed, mobile friendliness, and structured data  
* [Content SEO & Topic Authority](https://immortalseo.com/services/content-seo): Develop topic clusters and E‑E‑A‑T optimized content to establish subject‑matter authority  
* [Off-Page SEO & Authority Building](https://immortalseo.com/services/off-page-seo): Execute high-quality backlink acquisition, digital PR, and brand signal development  
* [Local SEO & Google Business Optimization](https://immortalseo.com/services/local-seo): Enhance local search visibility, citations, and review management  
* [AI-Enhanced SEO](https://immortalseo.com/services/ai-enhanced-seo): Dual-optimize for traditional SERPs and AI platforms like ChatGPT and SGE  
* [Semantic SEO & NLP Structuring](https://immortalseo.com/services/semantic-seo): Structure content around entities and semantic relationships for knowledge graph alignment  
* [E-commerce SEO](https://immortalseo.com/services/ecommerce-seo): Optimize product catalogs, implement schemas, and boost shopping feed performance  
* [SaaS & B2B SEO Services](https://immortalseo.com/services/saas-seo): Generate qualified leads with persona mapping and conversion-focused funnels  
* [Small Business SEO Services](https://immortalseo.com/services/small-business-seo): Affordable, high-impact SEO tailored for growing businesses  
* [Enterprise SEO & Large Site Optimization](https://immortalseo.com/services/enterprise-seo): Scalable frameworks for multi-million-page sites and global brands  

## Tools

* [SEO Cost Calculator](https://immortalseo.com/tools/seo-cost-calculator): Estimate your SEO investment based on industry, website size, and goals  
* [LLMs.txt Generator](https://immortalseo.com/tools/llmstxt-generator): Auto-generate LLM-friendly Markdown context files for your site  
* [Robots.txt Generator](https://immortalseo.com/tools/robots-txt-generator): Create customized robots.txt files to guide crawlers  
* [Schema Markup Generator](https://immortalseo.com/tools/schema-generator): Generate JSON-LD structured data for enhanced snippet visibility  
* [Meta Tags Generator](https://immortalseo.com/tools/meta-tags-generator): Craft optimized title tags and meta descriptions  
* [SEO Audit Checklist](https://immortalseo.com/tools/seo-audit-checklist): Comprehensive audit framework to identify SEO issues  

## Case Studies

* [OMGS.in – 270% Organic Traffic Growth](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies/omgs-in): AI-enhanced SEO strategy that delivered 270% growth in 6 months  
* [Zencoder.ai – 320% Growth in Organic Leads](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies/zencoder-ai): AI-ready content structure achieving top rankings and lead growth  
* [MillionCases.com – 340% Global Traffic Increase](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies/millioncases-com): Multi-platform SEO strategy for international expansion  
* [Confidential CBD Brand – 195% Traffic Growth](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies/cbd-brand): Authority-building SEO within regulatory constraints  
* [ChittorPolyFab.com – 180% Lead Growth](https://immortalseo.com/case-studies/chittorpolyfab-com): B2B SEO for manufacturing niche
